name: Dezgo
description: 🪄 Provides easy&fast access to text2image / image2image / inpainting AI. (57 models across Stable Diffusion 1.x/2.x and finetuned models)

api_methods.name: /upscale
api_methods.description:
Upscale an image by a factor of 2
This AI attempts to preserve contrasted edges and details as much as possible, producing a sharper image than simple interpolation methods. The result is returned as "image/png".

The following parameters influence the request cost: `image`
(see the "About" section for more details)

parameters.name: image
parameters.description:
The image to upscale

**Constraints:**
- Image size: `8 - 2048` pixels on either side (auto-resized)

utterances.utterance: Can you enhance this photo to make it sharper?
I need this picture to be upscaled for better quality.
Please upscale this image to improve its resolution.
Make this image clearer by upscaling it.
Could you increase the size of this image while keeping it sharp?
I want this graphic to be upscaled for a sharper look.
Upscale this image to enhance its details.
Can you make this image larger and more detailed?
Please enhance the clarity of this image by upscaling it.
I need this image to be upscaled for a sharper appearance.

api_methods.name: /image2image
api_methods.description:
Edit an existing image to fit a given text description


The following parameters influence the request cost: `init_image`, `steps`, `upscale`
(see the "About" section for more details)

License: CreativeML Open RAIL-M (https://dezgo.com/license.txt)

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description:
Describe how the final image should look like

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: an astronaut riding a horse, digital art, epic lighting, highly-detailed masterpiece trending HQ

parameters.name: init_image
parameters.description:
Upload the original image to be modified.
Supports PNG/JPEG files, up to a maximum of 1024x1024. Dimensions should be divisible by 8. The image is resized automatically if necessary.

**Constraints:**
- Image size: `8 - 1024` pixels on either side (auto-resized)

parameters.name: upscale
parameters.description:
Upscale the image by this factor using the Real-ESRGAN model. Currently only a factor of 2 is supported.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `1 - 2`

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description:
Unique image seed number. If not provided, the image will be random.
An unsigned 32-bit integer seed used to control the generator randomness.
Reusing the same seed with the same parameters will produce the same image.
Reusing the same seed with slightly different parameters tends to produce variations of the same composition ;
you can use this to experiment with the impact of different parameters.

If you instructed the API to choose a random seed, it can be retrieved from the response header `x-input-seed`

**Constraints:**
- Range: `0 - 4294967295`

parameters.name: steps
parameters.description:
Number of sampling steps. More steps = more details but also longer computation time.
More steps may improve quality under some circumstances and refine details, but it will take longer and be more expensive.
Fewer will result in lower quality images but is quicker and cheaper to process.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `10 - 150`

parameters.name: sampler
parameters.description:
Defines the sampling method used to generate the image.
The best samplers for low step counts tend to be `dpm`, `euler` and `euler_a`.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `ddim`
  - `dpm`
  - `euler`
  - `euler_a`
  - `k_lms`
  - `pndm`
parameters.default: euler_a

parameters.name: negative_prompt
parameters.description:
Describe what you DON'T want in the generated image

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: ugly, tiling, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn feet, poorly drawn face, out of frame, extra limbs, disfigured, deformed, body out of frame, blurry, bad anatomy, blurred, watermark, grainy, signature, cut off, draft

parameters.name: model
parameters.description:
The AI used to generate the image.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `abyss_orange_mix_2`
  - `analog_diffusion`
  - `anything_3_0`
  - `anything_4_0`
  - `basil_mix`
  - `blood_orange_mix`
  - `deliberate`
  - `dh_classicanime`
  - `disco_diffusion_style`
  - `double_exposure_diffusion`
  - `dreamshaper`
  - `duchaiten_anime`
  - `duchaiten_darkside`
  - `duchaiten_dreamworld`
  - `eimis_anime_diffusion_1`
  - `ely_orange_mix`
  - `emoji_diffusion`
  - `epic_diffusion_1`
  - `epic_diffusion_1_1`
  - `foto_assisted_diffusion`
  - `future_diffusion`
  - `hasdx`
  - `iconsmi_appiconsmodelforsd`
  - `inkpunk_diffusion`
  - `lowpoly_world`
  - `openjourney`
  - `openjourney_2`
  - `openniji`
  - `paint_journey_2_768px`
  - `papercut`
  - `pastel_mix`
  - `portrait_plus`
  - `realistic_vision_1_3`
  - `redshift_diffusion`
  - `redshift_diffusion_768px`
  - `something_2`
  - `stable_diffusion_fluidart`
  - `stable_diffusion_papercut`
  - `stable_diffusion_voxelart`
  - `stablediffusion_1_4`
  - `stablediffusion_1_5`
  - `stablediffusion_2_0_512px`
  - `stablediffusion_2_0_768px`
  - `stablediffusion_2_1_512px`
  - `stablediffusion_2_1_768px`
  - `steampunk_diffusion`
  - `synthwavepunk_v2`
  - `texture_diffusion`
  - `trinart_2_0`
  - `tshirt_diffusion`
  - `vectorartz_diffusion`
  - `vintedois_diffusion_v0_1`
  - `vox_2`
  - `waifudiffusion_1_3`
  - `waifudiffusion_1_4`
parameters.default: epic_diffusion_1_1

parameters.name: strength
parameters.description:
How strongly the original image should be altered (from subtle to drastic changes)
From 0.0 to 1.0

**Constraints:**
- Range: `0 - 1`

parameters.name: guidance
parameters.description:
Adjusts how much the AI tries to fit the prompt (higher = stricter, lower = more freedom).
Higher values means that the AI will try harder to match the text, but extreme values may produce more artifacts.
Lower values means that the AI is allowed more creative freedom in the interpretation of the text.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `-20 - 20`

utterances.utterance: Can you transform this image of a sunset into a futuristic cityscape?
I have a picture of a forest. Make it look like a magical fairyland with vibrant colors.

parameters.prompt: a magical fairyland with vibrant colors

utterances.utterance: Please edit this portrait to have a cyberpunk theme and upscale it.
Turn this beach photo into a winter wonderland, but avoid any snowmen.
Modify this garden picture to look like a scene from a fantasy novel with dragons.

parameters.prompt: a scene from a fantasy novel with dragons

utterances.utterance: I want this mountain image to have a surreal dreamlike quality.
Can you make this city skyline appear as if it's underwater?
Transform this desert scene into a lush jungle, and use a high guidance value.
Edit this castle photo to look like it's from a steampunk universe.
I have a picture of a cat. Make it look like a cartoon character.

api_methods.name: /inpainting
api_methods.description:
Modify a part of an image (using a mask) to fit a given text description


The following parameters influence the request cost: `init_image`, `steps`, `upscale`
(see the "About" section for more details)

License: CreativeML Open RAIL-M (https://dezgo.com/license.txt)


**Global Constraints:**
- Images must be of the same size: `init_image` and `mask_image`

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description:
Describe how the final image should look like

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: an astronaut riding a horse, digital art, epic lighting, highly-detailed masterpiece trending HQ

parameters.name: mask_image
parameters.description:
A black and white mask that defines the parts of the image to modify.
Should be the same size as init_image.

White pixels = modified ; Black pixels = unchanged

**Constraints:**
- Image size: `8 - 1024` pixels on either side (auto-resized)

constraints.inter-dependency: init_image, mask_image: Images must be of the same size.

parameters.name: init_image
parameters.description:
Upload the original image to be modified.
Supports PNG/JPEG files, up to a maximum of 1024x1024. Dimensions should be divisible by 8. The image is resized automatically if necessary.

**Constraints:**
- Image size: `8 - 1024` pixels on either side (auto-resized)

constraints.inter-dependency: init_image, mask_image: Images must be of the same size.

parameters.name: upscale
parameters.description:
Upscale the image by this factor using the Real-ESRGAN model. Currently only a factor of 2 is supported.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `1 - 2`

parameters.name: negative_prompt
parameters.description:
Describe what you DON'T want in the generated image

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: ugly, tiling, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn feet, poorly drawn face, out of frame, extra limbs, disfigured, deformed, body out of frame, blurry, bad anatomy, blurred, watermark, grainy, signature, cut off, draft

parameters.name: model
parameters.description:
The AI used to generate the image.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `stablediffusion_inpaint_1`
  - `stablediffusion_inpaint_2`
parameters.default: stablediffusion_inpaint_1

parameters.name: steps
parameters.description:
Number of sampling steps. More steps = more details but also longer computation time.
More steps may improve quality under some circumstances and refine details, but it will take longer and be more expensive.
Fewer will result in lower quality images but is quicker and cheaper to process.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `10 - 150`

parameters.name: guidance
parameters.description:
Adjusts how much the AI tries to fit the prompt (higher = stricter, lower = more freedom).
Higher values means that the AI will try harder to match the text, but extreme values may produce more artifacts.
Lower values means that the AI is allowed more creative freedom in the interpretation of the text.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `-20 - 20`

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description:
Unique image seed number. If not provided, the image will be random.
An unsigned 32-bit integer seed used to control the generator randomness.
Reusing the same seed with the same parameters will produce the same image.
Reusing the same seed with slightly different parameters tends to produce variations of the same composition ;
you can use this to experiment with the impact of different parameters.

If you instructed the API to choose a random seed, it can be retrieved from the response header `x-input-seed`

**Constraints:**
- Range: `0 - 4294967295`

parameters.name: sampler
parameters.description:
Defines the sampling method used to generate the image.
The best samplers for low step counts tend to be `dpm`, `euler` and `euler_a`.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `ddim`
  - `dpm`
  - `euler`
  - `euler_a`
  - `k_lms`
  - `pndm`
parameters.default: euler_a

utterances.utterance: Can you modify this image of a beach to add a sunset in the background?
I want to change the sky in this cityscape to a starry night. Use the stablediffusion_inpaint_2 model.
Please replace the car in this image with a futuristic vehicle and make sure it's highly detailed.
Transform the forest in this picture into a winter wonderland. Avoid any blurry effects.
Can you add a dragon flying over the castle in this image? Use the euler sampler.

parameters.prompt: a dragon flying over the castle

utterances.utterance: I'd like to change the color of the flowers in this garden to vibrant red. Use a guidance of 15.
Modify this portrait to give the person a futuristic helmet. Use a seed of 123456789.
Can you add a rainbow over the mountains in this image and upscale it by a factor of 2?
Please replace the old building in this photo with a modern skyscraper. Use 50 steps for more detail.
I want to change the ocean in this image to a vibrant coral reef. Avoid any grainy textures.

api_methods.name: /text2image
api_methods.description:
Generate an image from a text description
The result is returned as "image/png".

The following parameters influence the request cost: `width`, `height`, `steps`, `upscale`
(see the "About" section for more details)

License: CreativeML Open RAIL-M (https://dezgo.com/license.txt)


**Global Constraints:**
- Auto resolution: if not provided, fields `width` and `height` are automatically set to the model's native resolution.

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description:
Describe how the final image should look like

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: an astronaut riding a horse, digital art, epic lighting, highly-detailed masterpiece trending HQ

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description:
Unique image seed number. If not provided, the image will be random.
An unsigned 32-bit integer seed used to control the generator randomness.
Reusing the same seed with the same parameters will produce the same image.
Reusing the same seed with slightly different parameters tends to produce variations of the same composition ;
you can use this to experiment with the impact of different parameters.

If you instructed the API to choose a random seed, it can be retrieved from the response header `x-input-seed`

**Constraints:**
- Range: `0 - 4294967295`

parameters.name: guidance
parameters.description:
Adjusts how much the AI tries to fit the prompt (higher = stricter, lower = more freedom).
Higher values means that the AI will try harder to match the text, but extreme values may produce more artifacts.
Lower values means that the AI is allowed more creative freedom in the interpretation of the text.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `-20 - 20`

parameters.name: steps
parameters.description:
Number of sampling steps. More steps = more details but also longer computation time.
More steps may improve quality under some circumstances and refine details, but it will take longer and be more expensive.
Fewer will result in lower quality images but is quicker and cheaper to process.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `10 - 150`

parameters.name: sampler
parameters.description:
Defines the sampling method used to generate the image.
The best samplers for low step counts tend to be `dpm`, `euler` and `euler_a`.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `ddim`
  - `dpm`

  - `euler_a`
  - `k_lms`
  - `pndm`
parameters.default: euler_a

parameters.name: width
parameters.description:
The image width in pixels.
Must be divisible by 8 (auto-adjusted to the lowest multiple)

**Constraints:**
- Range: `320 - 1024`

parameters.name: upscale
parameters.description:
Upscale the image by this factor using the Real-ESRGAN model. Currently only a factor of 2 is supported.

**Constraints:**

parameters.name: negative_prompt

parameters.default: ugly, tiling, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn feet, poorly drawn face, out of frame, extra limbs, disfigured, deformed, body out of frame, blurry, bad anatomy, blurred, watermark, grainy, signature, cut off, draft

parameters.name: height
parameters.description:
The image height in pixels.
Must be divisible by 8 (auto-adjusted to the lowest multiple)

**Constraints:**
- Range: `320 - 1024`

parameters.name: model
parameters.description:
The AI used to generate the image.

**Constraints:**

  - `abyss_orange_mix_2`

parameters.prompt: a futuristic cityscape at night with neon lights

utterances.utterance: Can you enhance the resolution of this photo for me?

License: CreativeML Open RAIL-M (https://dezgo.com/license.txt)


**Global Constraints:**
- Images must be of the same size: `init_image` and `mask_image`

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description:

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters

parameters.description:
A black and white mask that defines the parts of the image to modify.

White pixels = modified ; Black pixels = unchanged

**Constraints:**
- Image size: `8 - 1024` pixels on either side (auto-resized)

constraints.inter-dependency: init_image, mask_image: Images must be of the same size.

parameters.name: init_image
parameters.description:
Upload the original image to be modified.
Supports PNG/JPEG files, up to a maximum of 1024x1024. Dimensions should be divisible by 8. The image is resized automatically if necessary.

**Constraints:**
- Image size: `8 - 1024` pixels on either side (auto-resized)

constraints.inter-dependency: init_image, mask_image: Images must be of the same size.

parameters.name: upscale
parameters.description:
Upscale the image by this factor using the Real-ESRGAN model. Currently only a factor of 2 is supported.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `1 - 2`

parameters.name: negative_prompt
parameters.description:
Describe what you DON'T want in the generated image

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: ugly, tiling, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn feet, poorly drawn face, out of frame, extra limbs, disfigured, deformed, body out of frame, blurry, bad anatomy, blurred, watermark, grainy, signature, cut off, draft

parameters.name: model
parameters.description:
The AI used to generate the image.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `stablediffusion_inpaint_1`
  - `stablediffusion_inpaint_2`
parameters.default: stablediffusion_inpaint_1

parameters.name: steps
parameters.description:
Number of sampling steps. More steps = more details but also longer computation time.
More steps may improve quality under some circumstances and refine details, but it will take longer and be more expensive.
Fewer will result in lower quality images but is quicker and cheaper to process.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `10 - 150`

parameters.name: guidance
parameters.description:
Adjusts how much the AI tries to fit the prompt (higher = stricter, lower = more freedom).
Higher values means that the AI will try harder to match the text, but extreme values may produce more artifacts.
Lower values means that the AI is allowed more creative freedom in the interpretation of the text.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `-20 - 20`

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description:
Unique image seed number. If not provided, the image will be random.
An unsigned 32-bit integer seed used to control the generator randomness.
Reusing the same seed with the same parameters will produce the same image.
Reusing the same seed with slightly different parameters tends to produce variations of the same composition ;
you can use this to experiment with the impact of different parameters.

If you instructed the API to choose a random seed, it can be retrieved from the response header `x-input-seed`

**Constraints:**
- Range: `0 - 4294967295`

parameters.name: sampler
parameters.description:
Defines the sampling method used to generate the image.
The best samplers for low step counts tend to be `dpm`, `euler` and `euler_a`.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `ddim`
  - `dpm`
  - `euler`
  - `euler_a`
  - `k_lms`
  - `pndm`
parameters.default: euler_a

utterances.utterance: Can you modify this image of a beach to add a sunset in the background?
I want to change the sky in this cityscape to a starry night. Use the stablediffusion_inpaint_2 model.
Please replace the background of this portrait with a forest scene and upscale it.
Transform the car in this image to look like a futuristic vehicle. Avoid any blurry effects.
Can you make the garden in this photo appear as if it's in full bloom? Use 50 steps for more detail.
I'd like to change the color of the dress in this image to red. Use the euler sampler.
Modify this landscape to include a waterfall. Set the guidance to 10 for a more accurate result.
Can you add a dragon flying in the sky of this castle image? Use a seed of 123456 for consistency.

parameters.prompt: a dragon flying in the sky

utterances.utterance: Please change the ocean in this picture to look like it's during a storm. Use the ddim sampler.
I want to replace the sky in this mountain photo with a sunrise. Use the k_lms sampler and 20 steps.

api_methods.name: /text2image
api_methods.description:
Generate an image from a text description
The result is returned as "image/png".

The following parameters influence the request cost: `width`, `height`, `steps`, `upscale`
(see the "About" section for more details)

License: CreativeML Open RAIL-M (https://dezgo.com/license.txt)


**Global Constraints:**
- Auto resolution: if not provided, fields `width` and `height` are automatically set to the model's native resolution.

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description:
Describe how the final image should look like

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: an astronaut riding a horse, digital art, epic lighting, highly-detailed masterpiece trending HQ

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description:
Unique image seed number. If not provided, the image will be random.
An unsigned 32-bit integer seed used to control the generator randomness.
Reusing the same seed with the same parameters will produce the same image.
Reusing the same seed with slightly different parameters tends to produce variations of the same composition ;
you can use this to experiment with the impact of different parameters.

If you instructed the API to choose a random seed, it can be retrieved from the response header `x-input-seed`

**Constraints:**
- Range: `0 - 4294967295`

parameters.name: guidance
parameters.description:
Adjusts how much the AI tries to fit the prompt (higher = stricter, lower = more freedom).
Higher values means that the AI will try harder to match the text, but extreme values may produce more artifacts.
Lower values means that the AI is allowed more creative freedom in the interpretation of the text.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `-20 - 20`

parameters.name: steps
parameters.description:
Number of sampling steps. More steps = more details but also longer computation time.
More steps may improve quality under some circumstances and refine details, but it will take longer and be more expensive.
Fewer will result in lower quality images but is quicker and cheaper to process.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `10 - 150`

parameters.name: sampler
parameters.description:
Defines the sampling method used to generate the image.
The best samplers for low step counts tend to be `dpm`, `euler` and `euler_a`.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `ddim`
  - `dpm`
  - `euler`
  - `euler_a`
  - `k_lms`
  - `pndm`
parameters.default: euler_a

parameters.name: width
parameters.description:
The image width in pixels.
Must be divisible by 8 (auto-adjusted to the lowest multiple)

**Constraints:**
- Range: `320 - 1024`

parameters.name: upscale
parameters.description:
Upscale the image by this factor using the Real-ESRGAN model. Currently only a factor of 2 is supported.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `1 - 2`

parameters.name: negative_prompt
parameters.description:
Describe what you DON'T want in the generated image

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: ugly, tiling, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn feet, poorly drawn face, out of frame, extra limbs, disfigured, deformed, body out of frame, blurry, bad anatomy, blurred, watermark, grainy, signature, cut off, draft

parameters.name: height
parameters.description:
The image height in pixels.
Must be divisible by 8 (auto-adjusted to the lowest multiple)

**Constraints:**
- Range: `320 - 1024`
